scripts.title: Script M F
scripts.description: to calc total female and male
scripts.code:
<?php 
//recuperar datos del screen $data['valor']
$sex1 = $data['sex1'];
$sex2 = $data['sex2'];
$sex3 = $data['sex3'];
$sex4 = $data['sex4'];
$sex5 = $data['sex5'];
$woman = 0;
$man = 0;
if($sex1 == "1"){
    $woman= $woman+1 ;
}else{
    $man= $man+1 ;
}
if($sex2 == "1"){
    $woman= $woman+1 ;
}else{
    $man= $man+1 ;
}
if($sex3 == "1"){
    $woman= $woman+1 ;
}else{
    $man= $man+1 ;
}
if($sex4 == "1"){
    $woman= $woman+1 ;
}else{
    $man= $man+1 ;
}
if($sex5 == "1"){
    $woman= $woman+1 ;
}else{
    $man= $man+1 ;
}
return ["man"=> $man, "woman"=> $woman];
